horizontals.word: Has the mutant ability to manipulate magnetic fields to control metallic objects.
The false king of pride rock who devises a plan to kill both Simba and Mufasa.
The sinister Royal Vizier to Agrabah’s Sultan who desires power over the land.
An escaped convict with abnormal physical strength due to experiments.
King Triton’s younger sister, the sea witch.
The arrogant hunter who was determined to have Belle’s hand in marriage.
Pronoun used to refer to things.

verticals.word: His objective was to bring stability to the universe by wiping out half of all life at every level.

He who must not be named.
Serial killer merged with alien offspring, Venom, to become the crazed symbiote.

Created by Stark, he attempted extinction-level genocide on humanity to maintain peace on earth.
A tyrannical warlord who possesses superhuman strength and is immortal.
